argument.name: text
argument.description: Text that you want read aloud

page.discussion: Converts text to speech using the .NET Framework

item.name: 'help the speech system with phonetic spelling
texttospeech("help me, oh bee wan ken oh bee")
'sometimes it comes out right without help
texttospeech("My name is Inigo montoya. you killed my father. prepare to die")
